chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: UniformSpace

Goal:
forall (x : T) (P : T -> Prop), ~ (forall eps : posreal, ~ (forall y : T, ball x eps y -> ~ P y)) -> {d : posreal | forall y : T, ball x d y -> ~ P y}

Premises:
ball = fun M : UniformSpace => UniformSpace.ball M (UniformSpace.class M) : forall M : UniformSpace, M -> R -> M -> Prop Argument M is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ R_scope _]
Record posreal : Set := mkposreal { pos : R; cond_pos : 0 < pos } For mkposreal: Argument scopes are [R_scope _]
locally = fun (x : T) (P : T -> Prop) => exists eps : posreal, forall y : T, ball x eps y -> P y : T -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ function_scope]
locally_locally : forall (x : T) (P : T -> Prop), locally x P -> locally x (fun y : T => locally y P)
decide_right : forall (C : Prop) (decide : {C} + {~ C}), ~ C -> forall P : {C} + {~ C} -> Prop, (forall H : ~ C, P (right H)) -> P decide
UniformSpace.Mixin : forall (M : Type) (ball : M -> R -> M -> Prop), (forall (x : M) (e : posreal), ball x e x) -> (forall (x y : M) (e : R), ball x e y -> ball y e x) -> (forall (x y z : M) (e1 e2 : R), ball x e1 y -> ball y e2 z -> ball x (e1 + e2) z) -> UniformSpace.mixin_of M
locally_singleton : forall (x : T) (P : T -> Prop), locally x P -> P x
locally_dist = fun (T : Type) (d : T -> R) (P : T -> Prop) => exists delta : posreal, forall y : T, d y < delta -> P y : forall T : Type, (T -> R) -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope]
Build_ProperFilter : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), (forall P : T -> Prop, F P -> exists x : T, P x) -> Filter F -> ProperFilter F
Build_Filter : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), F (fun _ : T => True) -> (forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x)) -> (forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q) -> Filter F
close = fun (M : UniformSpace) (x y : M) => forall eps : posreal, ball x eps y : forall M : UniformSpace, M -> M -> Prop Argument M is implicit and maximally inserted
Req_lt_aux : forall x y : R, (forall eps : posreal, Rabs (x - y) < eps) -> x = y
Req_le_aux : forall x y : R, (forall eps : posreal, Rabs (x - y) <= eps) -> x = y
Record mixin_of (M : Type) : Type := Mixin { ball : M -> R -> M -> Prop; ax1 : forall (x : M) (e : posreal), ball x e x; ax2 : forall (x y : M) (e : R), ball x e y -> ball y e x; ax3 : forall (x y z : M) (e1 e2 : R), ball x e1 y -> ball y e2 z -> ball x (e1 + e2) z } For mixin_of: Argument scope is [type_scope] For Mixin: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
ball_le : forall (x : ?M) (e1 e2 : R), e1 <= e2 -> forall y : ?M, ball x e1 y -> ball x e2 y where ?M : [T : UniformSpace |- UniformSpace]
ball_triangle : forall (x y z : ?M) (e1 e2 : R), ball x e1 y -> ball y e2 z -> ball x (e1 + e2) z where ?M : [T : UniformSpace |- UniformSpace]
ball_sym : forall (x y : ?M) (e : R), ball x e y -> ball y e x where ?M : [T : UniformSpace |- UniformSpace]
Heine_cor2 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_pt f x) -> forall eps : posreal, {delta : posreal | forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> Rabs (x - y) < delta -> Rabs (f x - f y) < eps}
Heine_cor1 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), a < b -> (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_pt f x) -> forall eps : posreal, {delta : posreal | delta <= b - a /\ (forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> Rabs (x - y) < delta -> Rabs (f x - f y) < eps)}
Ball_in_inter : forall (c1 c2 : R) (r1 r2 : posreal) (x : R), Boule c1 r1 x -> Boule c2 r2 x -> {r3 : posreal | forall y : R, Boule x r3 y -> Boule c1 r1 y /\ Boule c2 r2 y}
sig_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : {x : A | P x} -> Set), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (exist P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A | P x}, P0 s
uniform_continuity = fun (f : R -> R) (X : R -> Prop) => forall eps : posreal, exists delta : posreal, forall x y : R, X x -> X y -> Rabs (x - y) < delta -> Rabs (f x - f y) < eps : (R -> R) -> (R -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope]
Record Filter (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) : Prop := Build_Filter { filter_true : F (fun _ : T => True); filter_and : forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x); filter_imp : forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q } For Filter: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Build_Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ function_scope function_scope]
fct_ball_sym : forall (T : Type) (U : UniformSpace) (x y : T -> U) (e : R), fct_ball T U x e y -> fct_ball T U y e x
exist : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A), P x -> {x : A | P x}
proj1_sig : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), {x : A | P x} -> A
Rnot_le_lt : forall r1 r2 : R, ~ r1 <= r2 -> r2 < r1
Rnot_lt_le : forall r1 r2 : R, ~ r1 < r2 -> r2 <= r1
Rlt_not_le : forall r1 r2 : R, r2 < r1 -> ~ r1 <= r2
fct_ball_triangle : forall (T : Type) (U : UniformSpace) (x y z : T -> U) (e1 e2 : R), fct_ball T U x e1 y -> fct_ball T U y e2 z -> fct_ball T U x (e1 + e2) z
existT : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) (x : A), P x -> {x : A & P x}
Rbar_lt_locally : forall (a b : Rbar) (x : R), Rbar_lt a x -> Rbar_lt x b -> exists delta : posreal, forall y : R, Rabs (y - x) < delta -> Rbar_lt a y /\ Rbar_lt y b
